name: places/ChIJw2HW6wz2wokRfL2KDJUkvyU

plusCode.compoundCode: R343+VC Harlem, New York, NY, USA

adrFormatAddress: 102 W 124th St, Harlem, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text:
If I could give 10 stars, I would!

I was looking for weeks for a place to braid my hair & I am very picky because my hair is natural and I have a sensitive scalp. I was sold the second they told me that I don't have to straighten my hair before going in.

They made everything super easy for me. From making the appointment, showing them what I want, and providing me with all of the details. All of the ladies are very welcoming and know what they are doing. I wish I had gotten the name of the lady who braided my hair, but I was looking at the other clients getting braided, and they all do an amazing job.

I came in mentally prepared for hair pulling and leaving with a migraine, but this is by far my best experience that I've EVER had with braids of any kind. The braids are not too tight, and not once did I feel like my hair got yanked or pulled. It is now the end of the day, and my head does not hurt üôåüèæ. My head doesn't feel heavy, my scalp doesn't even itch & the braids are very easy to manage. I don't live in NY anymore, but I am here visiting my parents & I will definitely be coming here anytime I am back in NY & need to get my hair braided.

I'm soo happy that I found this place!

originalText.text: Called last minute and sent text of style. Was told to come she‚Äôd call her sister. I‚Äôm from out of state. When I got there, it was a typical African braiding salon. I was greeted, and given a seat. A young lady blew my hair out ( I have real 4c hair). I was told to bring my own hair, the hair I purchased they don‚Äôt use so that was kind of a waste. My hair came out nice, my only issue is she wouldn‚Äôt give me a price until we were almost done and we had to haggle a little bit, but I noticed she did this with most of the customers. Still  I‚Äôm not a cash carrier and I always intend to tip so knowing the price ahead is good. I also didn‚Äôt get the new customer discount but it‚Äôs ok. I‚Äôd come back.

originalText.text: Ask for Nathalie! Busy Harlem hair braiding spot. They all nice with the parting and braiding. Hair is included in the price. I loveeee my bohemian knotless braids. Took my 8 year old daughter the next day and I love her hair as well, she only got knotless with curly ends

originalText.text:
The outcome is beautifull üòç my girl Kaba is skilled!!!

However be sure to CONFIRM with her about all aspects (style, cost, personel) and to get a confirmation on file.

I had a 9am appointment - she didn't arrive to her store until 10am... I waited outside for close to an hour. With 2 other customers booked for a 930 and a 10.

I confirmed 40$ for cornrows and submitted this style... she hadn't told me that what I had asked for would actually come to 120$ until she was half way through with the style. I bargained based on the lateness and lack of transparency to a better price but was also frustrated with that lack of clarity as a customer.

She also said she would bring a friend to help do the other 2 women's hair but they hadn't shown up until an hour and a half later. These other two women were left waiting for 2-21/2 hours and ended up changing their styles because they were running out of time in their day...

CONFIRM CONFIRM CONFIRM - but the outcome was incredible.

originalText.text: there was a young girl that did my hair, she was extremely nice. And did my hair exactly I want it. Only problem I had was getting there and the owner of the shop telling me that I had to pay more because it was longer although she told me a certain price over the phone..
